subject: Re: [junit] Asserting Equality Of Collection Elements
msgSnippet: ... I am not sure if this works with standard Java collections, but we had the same problem with another collections library. We used to compare the string
messageBody:
On Monday 27 May 2002 02:06, kms_junit wrote:

> Now I need to ensure that the items in "A" are the same items that
> are in "B".

I am not sure if this works with standard Java collections, but we had
the same problem with another collections library. We used to compare
the string representations of the containers which worked well (for
sorted containers only!).

Robert
